title: TRAPPER'S LULLABY
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Tear da-
lines.translation: Tear da-

lines.text: Manchma' hab ich Lazy Eyes, manchma' hab ich Crazy Eyes
lines.translation: Sometimes I have lazy eyes, sometimes I have crazy eyes
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Doch ich habe immer nur für mein Baby Eyes
lines.translation: But I only ever had eyes for my baby.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich bin lange weg und komm nach Hause mit Croissants (ah)
lines.translation: I've been away for a long time and I come home with croissants (ah)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Denn ich fahr um 7 Uhr heim nach 'ner crazy Night (skrrt)
lines.translation: Because I'm driving home at 7 o'clock after a crazy night (skrrt)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich hab die ganze Nacht geworkt (-workt) und ja, ich war turnt
lines.translation: I worked all night and yeah, I was turned on.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Der Raum war voller Smoke, ich spür es in mei'm Atemweg
lines.translation: The room was full of smoke, I can feel it in my airways.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Die Sonne geht auf und die Birds sind der Wecker, um dem Trapper zur erzählen (ja)
lines.translation: The sun rises and the birds are the alarm clock to tell the trapper (yes)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Es ist jetzt Zeit zum Schlafen geh'n (Schlafen geh'n)
lines.translation: It's time to go to sleep now (go to sleep)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ah, u-und die birds (birds) chirpin' (chirpin')
lines.translation: Ah, and the birds (birds) chirpin' (chirpin')
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich brauch jemand, der mich rausholt, es ist urgent (fah-fah-fah)
lines.translation: I need someone to get me out of here, it's urgent (fah-fah-fah)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Mein Handy ist auf lautlos und auf nicht stören
lines.translation: My phone is on silent and do not disturb mode.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Die Sonne geht auf und ich hör die Vögel
lines.translation: The sun rises and I hear the birds.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich fahr durch leergefegte Straßen (ah)
lines.translation: I drive through deserted streets (ah)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: PTSD von blauen Lichtern, ich will doch nur schlafen (sleep)
lines.translation: PTSD from blue lights, I just want to sleep.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Illegaler Waffenbesitz in meinen Vorstrafen (brr)
lines.translation: Illegal possession of weapons is listed in my criminal record (brr)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Mister Officer, denken Sie wirklich, ich habe die Glocky in mei'm Wagen? (No, no)
lines.translation: Mr. Officer, do you really think I have the Glocky in my car? (No, no)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich darf nicht dumm sein, sonst passiert ein Unheil
lines.translation: I mustn't be stupid, otherwise something bad will happen.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Meine Vergangenheit darf dafür nicht der Grund sein (bitte nicht)
lines.translation: My past must not be the reason for this (please don't).
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wir sind zu weit gekomm'n, um reinzugeh'n
lines.translation: We've come too far to go in.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wir hatten 'ne kurze Schnur, aber dafür ein'n weiten Weg (on God)
lines.translation: We had a short cord, but a long way to go (on God)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wenn ich nach Hause komme, gehen die Laternen wieder aus (aus)
lines.translation: When I get home, the streetlights go out again.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Der ganze Raum riecht nach Diptyque, mein T-Shirt riecht nach Rauch
lines.translation: The whole room smells like Diptyque, my t-shirt smells like smoke.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Du bist mein Ride-or-Die und ich bin dein Hear-me-out (hear me)
lines.translation: You are my ride-or-die and I am your hear-me-out (hear me)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Du machst California Dreamin' aus dem Fiebertraum (dreams)
lines.translation: You make California Dreamin' out of the fever dream (dreams)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wenn ich heimkomm (komm), seh ich ein'n Topf auf dem Herd steh'n
lines.translation: When I come home (come), I see a pot standing on the stove.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Mein Baby macht ein'n finen Job (Fine Shit)
lines.translation: My baby's doing a fine job (Fine Shit)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Er hustlet lang, bis Steine an der Kette häng'n
lines.translation: He hustles for a long time, until stones hang from the chain.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Denn erst dann hat der Trapper's Lullaby sein Happy End
lines.translation: Only then does the Trapper's Lullaby have its happy ending.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.
